title: Monthly Meeting
content: Our Monthly meeting is held on the first monday of each month at the Smokey Mountain Pizza in Kuna, ID

title: Charter Party
content: We will have a small charter party for our members this year at Smokey Mountain Pizza in Kuna, ID

title: Car Show
content: CANCELED: Unfortunatly due to rising cases of COVID-19 in Idaho we are canceling our Kuna Car Show this year.  If you have already sent in registration we will mark you as paid for the 2021 Kuna Car Show. If you want a refund please contact Sam (208) 922-3015
